EmailTemplate.name: 201808_EMEAI_HAPP_Helo_Defense_JC.201808_EMEAI_HAPP_Helo_Defense_Email_JC
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's Get HAPPy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell understands that helicopters have many parts that will need to be replaced over time and this can be a costly business. Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) is here to help, by taking the uncertainty out of repair and maintenance costs. A fixed price HAPP contract guarantees that your repair bills won't exceed your budget. Let's get you HAPPy and book an appointment today!
BOOK AN APPOINTMENT <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAPP_Helo.html]]>
